meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Stacie Court Chuck Ladd Sarah Robertson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4408.

div.div: (Sarah: Check out some memorable memorabilia in the Biggest Little State in the Union. Treasures of Rhode Island, next on Jeopardy!)

td.p: Stacie Court, a voice instructor from Savannah, Georgia
Chuck Ladd, a project manager from Raleigh, North Carolina
Sarah Robertson, a media planner from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,399)

tr.td: THE NEW TESTAMENT
ABBREVIATE IT!
WORLD'S FAIRS & EXPOS
FATHER
HEY, "BEAUTIFUL"
CAN I GET YOUR NUMBER?

Sarah
')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: Sarah
Chuck
Stacie

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Sarah
Chuck
Stacie
RHODE ISLAND
SUPERHERO SANDWICH
AWARD-WINNING AUTHORS
PIPE DREAMS
THE MOONS OF SATURN
X LACKS

(Alex: This is not the usual Ex-Lax. Let me give you an example of a clue in this category. "Lose an 'x' from this type of cat and you're left with a human male". The correct response, "What is Manx?" Lose the x, you're left with "man".)
